definition: acting the part of a character on stage
details:
noun
- acting the part of a character on stage
= synonyms: characterization, enactment, personation
- representation by drawing or painting etc
= synonyms: depiction, delineation
- any likeness of a person, in any medium
= synonyms: portrait
- a representation by picture or portraiture
= synonyms: depiction, depicting, portraying
- a word picture of a person's appearance and character
= synonyms: portraiture, portrait
